layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus Lord, I love You. Noth -- ing more do I want. Noth -- ing in this whole world Sat -- is -- fies as You do, Lord. Though I wan -- der a -- way, Still Your love seeks af -- ter me, Reach -- ing me; I'm sub -- dued And I turn back to You.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus Lord, I love You. Nothing more do I want. Nothing in this whole world Satisfies as You do, Lord. Though I wander away, Still Your love seeks after me, Reaching me; I'm subdued And I turn back to You.
